mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN i."D_DAY" > t.dangerous THEN 1 END) AS red, COUNT(CASE WHEN i."D_DAY" <= t.dangerous AND i."D_DAY" > t.warning THEN 1 END) AS yellow, COUNT(CASE WHEN i."D_DAY" <= t.warning THEN 1 END) AS green FROM Inner_View i INNER JOIN traffic t ON i.user_index = t.user_index INNER JOIN users u ON u.user_index = t.user_index WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id}
